page.title: 14LOCAL GOVERNMENT-PARISH
page.content:
{Mr.B.RABEY}is the present chairman of the Parish Council.He was elected to the post for 12 months by the 9 other Councillors at one of the monthly Council meetings which are held in the Committee room of the Parish Hall.He chose to stand for election onto the Parish Council because as a local resident he wanted somthing different and interesting to do which allowed him to know about local matters and to do somthing about them.As chairman {Mr.Rabey's job}is to control the monthly meetings.On average he spends some 3 hours a week on Council business.
{
